            前端调试太痛苦？这 7 个技巧直接解决 90% 问题！

                  </time> <svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="read-icon" data-v-61fb5e44=""><path d="M7.90078 2.80078C4.49278 2.80078 1.74745 6.11672 0.800781 7.77469C1.74745 9.58339 4.49278 13.2008 7.90078 13.2008C11.3088 13.2008 14.0541 9.58339 15.0008 7.77469C14.0541 6.11672 11.3088 2.80078 7.90078 2.80078Z" stroke="currentColor" data-v-61fb5e44=""></path><circle cx="7.89922" cy="8.00078" r="2.2" stroke="currentColor" data-v-61fb5e44=""></circle></svg> <span class="views-count" data-v-61fb5e44="">

                  </span> <!----></div></div> <div style="flex:1;" data-v-61fb5e44=""></div> <!----> <!----></div> <!----> <!----> <!----> <!----> <div id="article-root" itemprop="articleBody" class="main" data-v-61fb5e44=""><div class="article-viewer markdown-body result"><p>大家好，我是 <strong>前端架构师 - 大卫</strong>。</p>
<p>更多优质内容请关注微信公众号 @<strong>程序员大卫</strong>。</p>
<blockquote>
<p><strong>初心为助前端人🚀，进阶路上共星辰✨，</strong></p>
<p><strong>您的点赞👍与关注❤️，是我笔耕不辍的灯💡。</strong></p>
</blockquote>
<h2 data-id="heading-0">背景</h2>
<p>在前端开发和排查线上问题的过程中，我们经常会遇到调试受限的场景：无法直接修改线上代码、hover 和 select 样式难以定位、JS 报错追踪困难等。为了提高调试效率，我们可以借助 Proxyman、Chrome DevTools 等工具，掌握一些实用的小技巧，让复杂问题的排查变得更加简单高效。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">1. 使用 Chrome 自带的替换功能</h2>
<ol>
<li>打开 Chrome 开发者工具，切换到 <code>Network</code> 面板。在请求列表中右键点击 <code>www.baidu.com</code>，选择 <code>Override content</code>：</li>
</ol>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/a2cc5292bba340d090cae3ebab6ea70b~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=ad7UiuE3cmeYu2AT3ULY233f6PQ%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<ol start="2">
<li>页面上方会出现一个提示栏，点击其中的 <code>Select folder</code> 按钮：</li>
</ol>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/ae10da677cc749c3bf1cd54530edddb7~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=XCshxtbB%2Bqlsr4QvaFavy6sbyY4%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<ol start="3">
<li>在弹出的文件选择器中，选择 <code>桌面</code> 文件夹。随后会弹出一个对话框，询问是否允许开发者工具修改文件，点击 <code>修改文件</code>：</li>
</ol>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/dcae1aaf9dc642638f9106d0513f1e29~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=VuIMN26gu%2Fl7ESOWWtL2AH%2B%2BD%2Fw%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<ol start="4">
<li>Chrome 会自动在桌面创建一个名为 <code>www.baidu.com</code> 的文件夹：</li>
</ol>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/f76b90177f0644d1b050b6906339c95a~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=VU33YSvTK2%2Fci365iMCaMPFZ3Bo%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<ol start="5">
<li>在 <code>index.html</code> 的 <code>&lt;head&gt;</code> 标签内插入如下代码，并保存文件：</li>
</ol>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/4d4473e04cf341d7a824b83f51cacb20~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=W8wJ0%2Bu8gxXlEAmlUsi91B1D5nE%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">script</span> <span class="hljs-attr">src</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"https://unpkg.com/vconsole/dist/vconsole.min.js"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">script</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">script</span>&gt;</span><span class="javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> vConsole = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">VConsole</span>();</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">script</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<ol start="6">
<li>返回浏览器并"刷新"百度首页，可以看到页面右下角已经成功出现了 <code>vConsole 调试面板</code>：</li>
</ol>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/f06484e06b1544dc9081e814c033a246~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=MBBZtdN3K0OLHqPUm%2BSCmMRsEEg%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">2. 使用 Proxyman 的本地映射（Map Local）</h2>
<p>我们可以通过本地映射功能随意修改线上代码，或插入自定义脚本来进行调试。假设我们要调试的页面是 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.baidu.com%2F" target="_blank" title="https://www.baidu.com/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">百度首页</a>，这里以插入 <code>vConsole.js</code> 为例说明。</p>
<p>先打开 Proxyman，然后在浏览器中访问 "百度首页"。接着回到 Proxyman，按下 <code>Command + F</code>，输入 <code>www.baidu.com</code> 来过滤相关请求。</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/3a473d7fcf844f99b2bc98009fb6cc41~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=bZysckDiZ%2BUn%2F4oZ7opjW%2Bepx%2FY%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>右键选中该请求，点击 <code>工具 - 本地映射</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/f3e4a57a013a42649dd37df4ea72a5ea~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=9XvK9ykrplKaA5CRVmPD2%2FKwJec%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>在弹出的配置面板中，名称可以填写为 <code>vConsole</code>，然后在下方的主体内容区域，在 <code>&lt;head&gt;&lt;/head&gt;</code> 标签内插入以下脚本：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">script</span> <span class="hljs-attr">src</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"https://unpkg.com/vconsole/dist/vconsole.min.js"</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">script</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">script</span>&gt;</span><span class="javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> vConsole = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">VConsole</span>();</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">script</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p>点击“保存”按钮。</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/f95d473ae7744cfdb684a732ddd7fbc6~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=CUtlZMDy2GUBhiU8bw7KzxbETbw%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>刷新 "百度首页"，就会看到右下角已经成功加载了 <code>vConsole</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/dd006e8bd7be4807ac013f80081a637c~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=f4ErCLhlL6KXdSTiV048bsyiM%2Bs%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<blockquote>
<p>注：<code>Charles</code> 中也有类似的功能操作。</p>
</blockquote>
<h2 data-id="heading-3">3. 使用 Proxyman 的远程映射（Map Remote）</h2>
<p>远程映射与本地映射类似，首先同样选中百度的请求，右键点击 <code>工具 - 远程映射</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/87bc4e7408dc4a6cbecf36fc45ca7e0f~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=agdJ1C99I8LC5C0xoTbOqN%2BEZpA%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>在弹出的窗口中：</p>
<ul>
<li>名称可以随意取，比如 "百度远程映射到本地"</li>
<li>主机地址填写为你本地开启的服务地址，如 <code>http://127.0.0.1:5501/index.html</code></li>
</ul>
<p>失去焦点后，系统会自动填充协议、端口和路径等字段。</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/78ec5407ee314ec3bb002f80b48dda59~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=KUl2XDlAK3rBrXWhUvAon0oCPjg%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击 “完成” 按钮即可。</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/ef4557fab99c451c80a2082e53fdffa5~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=jIO6c0lxlOii0%2Blj%2BnTD00rT6Z0%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>刷新"百度首页"，此时你会看到内容已经成功映射为本地页面。</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/eb72b157853a469a80daefd95937d905~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=cAUZTO1c%2B8R62zh2sSvhDhXMGyQ%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-4">4. 手动添加 Source Map</h2>
<p>当项目上线后，如果没有接入错误监控系统，前端报错往往很难追踪源头。</p>
<p>以一个 Vite 创建的 Vue 项目为例，<code>App.vue</code> 中代码如下：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">script</span> <span class="hljs-attr">setup</span> <span class="hljs-attr">lang</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"ts"</span>&gt;</span><span class="javascript">
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">hanldeClick</span> = (<span class="hljs-params"></span>) =&gt; {
  <span class="hljs-keyword">throw</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">Error</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"test error."</span>);
};
</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">script</span>&gt;</span>

<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">template</span>&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">h1</span> @<span class="hljs-attr">click</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"hanldeClick"</span>&gt;</span>点击我报错!<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">h1</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">template</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p>运行以下命令完成构建并启动本地预览，接着点击页面上的 "<strong>点击我报错!</strong> "，此时控制台会输出错误信息。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-bash" lang="bash">pnpm build
pnpm preview
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/458a52b3ef874097b6a7ab76e3afc886~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=hbhGQ4khBVXj3AIct5akQEoAqxc%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>我们会发现报错信息无法定位到具体文件和位置。此时可以手动添加 Source Map 文件。</p>
<p>在<code>Console 面板</code>中点击报错的文件名：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/a2a0a612284749e282db0a79e4b2104b~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=XyOUcPk1qOza5c7TJUYWvn%2FJ5Og%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>它会自动在 <code>Sources</code> 面板中打开对应的 JS 文件，然后右键点击并选择 <code>Add source map...</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/f6142867eecc41a8898e852fc1985068~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=3l6zNMy8jtYITv6mkesoAkeHIiI%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>在弹出的输入框中输入 Source Map 地址，比如本地启动的文件：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-perl" lang="perl">http:<span class="hljs-regexp">//</span><span class="hljs-number">127.0</span>.<span class="hljs-number">0</span>.<span class="hljs-number">1</span>:<span class="hljs-number">5501</span>/<span class="hljs-keyword">index</span>-Dp1zXMZ4.js.map
</code></pre>
<p>点击 "Add" 按钮完成。</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/d6452145cef445b3bb82357e47109246~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=0Pm%2FO8IUJ%2F5sJNXl%2FELf%2BGe5PXI%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>此时<code>Console 面板</code>中的错误提示就可以定位到源文件了：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/cc8d9a5429a34308a154782c8226ff14~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=AqYzkShZ7SaWUS4K5uiYatuDJs4%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<blockquote>
<p>💡 <strong>PS：这个 <code>.map</code> 文件是怎么生成的？</strong></p>
<p>只需在 <code>vite.config.ts</code> 中设置 <code>build.sourcemap: true</code>，然后执行命令 <code>pnpm run build</code>，即可生成对应的 Source Map 文件。</p>
</blockquote>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ts" lang="ts"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> { defineConfig } <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"vite"</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> vue <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"@vitejs/plugin-vue"</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">default</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">defineConfig</span>({
  <span class="hljs-attr">plugins</span>: [<span class="hljs-title function_">vue</span>()],
  <span class="hljs-attr">build</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">sourcemap</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>,
  },
});
</code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-5">5. Select 下拉框的样式调试</h2>
<p>调试下拉框样式时，经常会遇到这样的问题：当 Select 下拉内容展开后，一旦切换到浏览器 DevTools 面板，下拉内容就会自动收起，无法继续选中或查看相关样式。</p>
<p>下面以 "Ant Design" 的 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fant.design%2Fcomponents%2Fselect-cn" target="_blank" title="https://ant.design/components/select-cn" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Select 组件</a> 为例说明：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/01ad37dca444408f8cf0e29809516b37~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=lGCyxzFqZKY%2FY4cDw7KUfYHPqOM%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>解决方法是打开 DevTools 的 <code>More tools</code> 菜单，选择 <code>Rendering</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/d106dfe7da3b4949a01b7a6d347bc729~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=hik1wOmQkHEUeQw3BVcw3bQ09l4%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>在打开的 <code>Rendering</code> 面板中，勾选 <code>Emulate a focused page</code>：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/9ec2e0eb0b564f90acd2f518f18e1bf5~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=jy1QuFlg39hH1x%2F71i%2BeR4frc7I%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>此时就可以轻松调试 Select 下拉样式了：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/a05e332063f6441eb55784ade97a98ec~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=Y48Di3SJVknlXNdH3lPJKEz7kvY%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-6">6. Hover 样式调试 - CSS 实现</h2>
<p>如果 Hover 效果是通过 CSS 实现的，例如：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">h1</span>&gt;</span>Hello<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">h1</span>&gt;</span>

<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">style</span>&gt;</span><span class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">h1</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:hover</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: red;
}
</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">style</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p>可以在 DevTools 的 <code>Styles</code> 面板中点击 <code>:hov</code> 按钮：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/e079badb31814f65bfc54469bbbaeb89~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=As6YDK%2BdNMG8sFO0lHrbNHeKQ8I%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>勾选 <code>:hover</code> 选项，就能手动激活 Hover 样式效果：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/480da916c19d45bab15f69d6f7f50027~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=ocT%2Bogvje92SBuA5tRX7WHM79Xk%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-7">7. Hover 样式调试 - JS 实现（方式一）</h2>
<p>在 Vue 项目中，许多 Hover 效果是通过 JS 绑定 <code>mouseout</code> 事件来实现的。为了便于调试这类效果，我们可以临时移除相关事件监听。</p>
<p>下面以 "Element Plus" 的 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Felement-plus.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fcomponent%2Ftooltip.html" target="_blank" title="https://element-plus.org/zh-CN/component/tooltip.html" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Tooltip组件</a> 为例，首先在 DevTools 中选中对应的元素：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/fd1c5a43592845e1a559c78d48f50e1f~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=eBU8zRI2%2F7pQnH8XSFewbFbtBKc%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>然后切换到 <code>Event Listeners</code> 面板，展开 <code>mouseleave</code>，点击移除事件：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/5f131568753c43658b4eab4591dee3cd~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=9p1DQ6fgAi2h%2FQ%2BUcOqOvN8OUmw%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>此时，当我们再次将鼠标悬停在该元素上并移开时，Tooltip 不会自动消失，这样就可以方便地修改和调试其样式了：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/93df01dd979e49a4a9013d1895f05f86~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=CzS4V0SIOcZ%2F5Oh%2FVs7vg4n7kbU%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-8">7. Hover 样式调试 - JS 实现（方式二）</h2>
<p>在 React 项目中，事件通常是绑定在应用的根元素上，比较难移除，这时可以使用快捷键打断点的方式。</p>
<p>下面以 "Ant Design" 的 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fant.design%2Fcomponents%2Ftooltip-cn" target="_blank" title="https://ant.design/components/tooltip-cn" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Tooltip 组件</a> 为例，首先得在 "DevTools" 中切换到 <code>Sources</code> 面板：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/f632b1257c3542bc9fbe9fee2dfd8a99~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=Tws6M6DZ1WJf1ojAtPBVUYDQkek%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>将鼠标移动到 Tooltip 上的文字，然后按下 Mac 电脑快捷键 <code>fn + F8</code>（Windows 用户直接按 <code>F8</code>），当鼠标移开时，断点会自动触发：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/76d768fd5be241e9bd606ca053ba2c52~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=mMhyYxEuTp0gVSnY6JwoS6z7Fuc%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>现在就可以在断点状态下轻松修改样式了：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/93200927348d4ed798356895ac874b23~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg56iL5bqP5ZGY5aSn5Y2r:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1752663899&amp;x-signature=bHraLulUD4jD%2F3DCtoeKezcmiuw%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-9">总结</h2>
<p>这篇文章分享了 6 个前端调试中非常实用的技巧，涵盖了网络层的本地/远程映射、source map 的手动添加，以及 select 和 hover 样式的调试方法。掌握这些技巧，不仅能提升你在实际项目中的问题排查效率，也能帮助你在和后端联调、线上问题定位时更加得心应手。</p>
<p>建议将这些技巧收藏并在项目中多加实践，你会发现前端调试其实可以非常丝滑！</p></div></div>
